mapper.insert: INSERT INTO table_user ( first_name, project_id, created_by, is_machine) VALUES ( #{first_name}, #{project_id}, #{created_by}, 1)
mapper.select: SELECT tu.user_id, tu.first_name, pt.project_name FROM table_user tu INNER JOIN table_project pt ON tu.project_id = pt.project_id WHERE tu.is_deleted = 0 AND tu.is_machine = 1
mapper.update: UPDATE table_user SET is_deleted = 1 WHERE user_id = #{user_id}
